Key Match Events: Collin Sexton and Walker Kessler contributed 20 and 16 points respectively
The Suns led by as much as 16 points
Utah cut the deficit to one point in the third quarter
Phoenix rallied for a quick six points to regain a 75-68 lead with seven minutes left in the third quarter
Pre-Game Insights: The Jazz will return to Delta Center for a two-game homestand to host the Nets and the Hornets
Johnny Juzang, Brice Sensabaugh, Jordan Clarkson, John Collins, and Keyonte George were out due to injuries
Post-Match Reflections: Lauri Markkanen expressed pride in the team's effort despite the loss
The team highlighted the importance of strong perimeter defense
Miscellaneous Highlights: Collin Sexton gave the Jazz a boost in the second half
Isaiah Collier and Lauri Markkanen connected on a long-range alley-oop
